description:
Litwick, known as the Candle Pokémon. It is based on a candle. It is known for fooling people and guiding them with its light when it is in fact actually stealing life energy from the victim, which it then uses as fuel to burn for the flame on its head.
IGN`s Sam Claiborn scoffed at the idea of a candle Pokémon, along with the design of the 5th generation altogether.
name: Hitomoshi
